page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: Many men and women in the community make their own wine from produce obtained growing wild in the countryside, such as dandelion wine made from dandelions, sugar, oranges etc. or elderflower wine to name but two. Beer brewed at home is now popular mostly made from commercial beer kits. Gardening plays a large part in the lives of people in the area because some have large gardens. They grow vegetables, salad crops, flowers, etc.. Cricket and tennis are played in summer. In winter soccer is played at Meinciau and Rugby at Pontyates. Women knit, crochet, sew, etc.. Patchwork is now popular, making such items as quilts and cushion covers.
